<title level="1" right="Hazard 2" pfs="">[Brown Mold](/Hazards.aspx?ID=35)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Environmental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=62" />
<trait label="Fungus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=77" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 77</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

This unassuming fungus leeches heat out of the air.

---

**Stealth**
DC 21 (trained)

**Disable**
DC 18 [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) (trained) to safely remove the mold

**Emit Cold** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27)); 5 feet. Brown mold deals 2d6 cold damage to nearby creatures.

<column gap="tiny">

**AC** 18, **Fort** +11, **Ref** +5

**HP**
30 (BT 15)

**Immunities**
critical hits, fire, object immunities, precision damage

**Weaknesses**
cold 10

</column>

**Leech Warmth** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** Fire comes within 5 feet of the brown mold; **Effect** The brown mold expands into every square adjacent to its space. As it grows, it pulls more heat from its surroundings, dealing 2d6+6 cold damage (DC 18 basic Fortitude save) to creatures within 10 feet after it expands.

---
**Reset**
After expanding, the brown mold can’t grow again for 1 day.
